snippet: A Palestinian militant was killed in the strike hours after an Israeli citizen was stabbed to death by a Palestinian. The two attacks raised the specter of further confrontation.
abstract: Palestinian militant Haitham al-Mishal is killed in Israeli missile strike in Gaza hours after Israeli civilian Evyatar Borovsky is stabbed to death by Palestinian in West Bank; two attacks, coming against backdrop of growing tensions, are first such killings in months and raise specter of further confrontation.

byline.original: By ISABEL KERSHNER and FARES AKRAM
byline.contributor: Isabel Kershner reported from Jerusalem, and Fares Akram from Gaza.

lead_paragraph: A Palestinian militant was killed in the strike hours after an Israeli citizen was stabbed to death by a Palestinian. The two attacks raised the specter of further confrontation.

headline.seo: Israeli Airstrike Kills Palestinian in Gaza
headline.main: Gazan Killed After Israeli Is Stabbed to Death in the West Bank
headline.print_headline: Gazan Killed After Israeli Is Stabbed to Death in the West Bank
